thread.title: Justice Dept. won't file criminal charges over allegations of IRS targeting conservative groups

title: Justice Dept. won't file criminal charges over allegations of IRS targeting conservative groups
text:
Justice Dept. won't file criminal cha... Justice Dept. won't file criminal charges over allegations of IRS targeting conservative groups There are 1 comment on the Los Angeles Times story from 1 hr ago, titled Justice Dept. won't file criminal charges over allegations of IRS targeting conservative groups . In it, Los Angeles Times reports that: 
IRS official Lois Lerner ultimately resigned amid a federal investigation into the agency's handling of tax-exempt applications from conservative groups. She has been absolved of wrongdoing. Join the discussion below, or Read more at Los Angeles Times.
